Name: Faience shabti
Description: A fine, <!-->turquoise glazed faience shabti, with back pillar and plinth. The figure has finely moulded features and wig, which is ornamented at the ends. The beard is plain and short. The hands are barely indicated and are carrying a hoe and rope for the small basket over the shoulder in the left hand and a pick in the right. There is no inscription.
